no.kartverket.positionorientation

Class KalmanFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.kartverket.positionorientation.KalmanFilter

  • public class KalmanFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple implementation for a Kalman filter.

    The code is based on the kalman filter example code in the ejml manual

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  KalmanFilter.PredictionMatrixUpdater
      Set model and covariance matrixes for the next Kalman filter prediction step

        Parameters:
